item.title: Trying to automate Azure Active Directory App Registration process using Terraform
item.description: > Updated content: I wrote the original post almost 6 months ago and since then the AAD Terraform provider has been updated several times. When I wrote the post I used the version 0.11 and right now the provider is on version 1.1.1, that’s a considerable version bump so some people asked me if I could update this post. Without further ado let’s rebuild this example using the 1.1.1 version.
